title: To Know Me
description: Seventeen-year-old Mae is convinced that the consequences of her poor decisions have caused the untimely deaths of three close family members within a year, no matter how ludicrous her thoughts seem to those she loves. The solution? Run away so no one else she cares for gets hurt. Despite Maeâ€™s efforts to blend in at a new high school just long enough to graduate, she meets Ty, the "perfect guy" with his own secrets and a relentless interest in her. She must decide if she can stop running from the past and still protect those she loves; and if she does return home, whether Ty is really the right person to protect her fragile heart. Complete 4 Book Series: To Know Me To Love Me To Forgive Me To Choose Me **To Know Me is an upper YA-New Adult Romance Series, not intended for younger readers.
author: Marcy Blesy
